page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: ANCIENT AND MODERN. In our D-Block there is a large variety of houses, ranging from the very old to the very new. THATCHED COTTAGES. There are almost thirty thatched cottages in our block,with pretty walled gardens filled with roses. One cotage is being rethatched. MANOR HOUSES. There are three manor houses in the villages,two in West Hanney and one in East Hanney.Priors'Court in West Hanney was mentioned in the original Domesday book. MODERN HOUSES. The rest of the houses in our villages date from about the 1700's to modern times. They are built in a variety of materials, mostly brick. Some of them are rendered and painted.
